titles.title: Directing the Secretary of the Senate to make technical corrections in the enrollment of S. 523.

action.text: Mr. Hansen asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 7/11/1995--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of the Senate to make technical corrections in the enrollment of S. 523 (amending the Colorado River Basin Salinity Control Act to authorize additional measures to carry out the control of salinity upstream of Imperial Dam).
